survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from gym members about their satisfaction with the available equipment and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of gym equipment available?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of gym equipment available?

questions.question_text: Which types of equipment do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand equipment preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an 'Other' option for open text.

script.question_text: Which types of equipment do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the gym equipment?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the gym equipment?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience equipment being out of service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to assess equipment maintenance issues.

script.question_text: How often do you experience equipment being out of service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our gym to others based on the equipment available?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our gym to others based on the equipment available?
